text: Hey Carter, the tickets API gives me all the tickets related data. But it doesn't give me updates history, it gives last updated at since each ticket id is a unique row.
I wanted for each ticket, how many times and when did the updates happen

lets say ticket id 1 was updated 4 times, groups/teams attribute was changed each time. But when I fetch the tickets data, it will only show the latest value of group/team and when was it last updated
